reporting_cycle: The Panel of Experts to provide a midterm briefing no later than 31 March 2011 and a final report no later than 30 days prior to termination of its mandate
summary:
9. Decides that States shall notify the Committee in advance of providing assistance and supplies into Darfur.

10. Decides that sales or supplies of arms and related materiel to Sudan shall be conditional upon necessary end-user documentation.

11. Expresses intention to review implementation of measures imposed in resolution 1591 (2005).

12. Reaffirms the Committee's mandate to encourage dialogue with interested Member States.

13. Welcomes the Committee's work on drawing attention to responsibilities of private sector actors.

14. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
